bug.author: willprice
bug.summary: Using distributed_backend='dp' causes result.write to fail
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Saving results with result.write is broken up DP distributed training. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Perform something like this result.write('blah', ['one', 'two', 'three'] in a test_step and run with distributed_backend='dp', PTL will then call into Result.dp_reduce and try to run self[k] = value.mean(dim=-1) where value is the predictions dictionary which will subsequently fail.
